name: traumatic
content:
traumatic adjective
(SHOCKING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 causing severe and lasting emotional shock and pain: Some of the most disturbed children had witnessed really traumatic things, such as rape and murder.
informal causing worry or upset: Taking exams is always traumatic for me.
More examplesFewer examplesUnder deep hypnosis she remembered the traumatic events of that night.There may be traumatic incident in your past that you have blanked out.I found it very traumatic to see my own child being anaesthetized.He found his 40th birthday quite traumatic.
